channel.title: Google on Martin's Blog

item.title: 怎样使用两个DevOps研究模型？
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 本文要覆盖的章节是《 How to use the research models》 这一章。双模型在今年的报告中首次出现了，它们是效能模型和生产力模型。为什么会存在两个模型？有什么

item.title: 如何做横向行业的DevOps表现基准测试？
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 长期关注我的blog和微信公众号（DevOps教练）的朋友可以发现，我今年从这个调查问卷开始，陆续发布了一些列文章。如果给这些文章一个文集标

item.title: 2019年加速度DevOps状态调查报告-导读
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 凭借六年多的来自全球31,000多名专业人士的数据的研究，2019年加速发展状态报告是同类研究中规模最大、持续时间最长的研究。2019年加速

item.title: What's Google Chrome OS
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 看完这个视频之后，还是没搞清楚：它到是一个快速的浏览器，还是一个快速启动的OS加浏览器，如果它仍然需要OS的话，那么它不过是一个Redesi

item.title: gOS looks green
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Today I installed gOS on my laptop; openSuSE did great work for me 3 years. I’d like to play some new things. So, check my new desktop out.http://picasaweb.google.com/liuzh66/GOSIf you go its wetsite http://thinkgos.com/, you will see it talks lots of cloud. It’s interesting, but it is not the reson i chose it. Ubuntu 8.04 is inside gOS. So, it time to learn a new linux system. I neve use a Derbin based system, I’m not sure it could run for me how long.

item.title: 从云计算联想到第一代电脑系统
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 记得以前看过一本描写Bill Gets的书，他上中学的时候，在河滨中心通过一个远程终端，连接到某大学的计算机系统，输入程序代码，并且得到代码在

item.title: Do you like Chrome?
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Peoples always love whatever Google’s invention, I am using Gmail and GTalk every day too. But I think I couldn’t say I like google anytime. That’s just because Chrome. It was installed on my laptop yesterday. I’m trying it out when I access any of my google services (Gmail, Reader, Doc, etc…). There are some App shortcuts are already on my XP deskdtop.  Base on one day experience of Chrome, I’d like to talk about reasons I don’t like Chrome. I has not tested it too much at present, just few comments below:

item.title: one minute to build your wap version blog
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Wap version of my blog **http://tinyurl.com/martinliu ** You could also build yours within one minute. I think it is worth to do, since more and more peoples are surfing from mobile device. You might get a wap link on your home page, I will do it after get this post publish out.Now, it time to explain how to do a wap blog. open Google Moblizer in your browser enter your url of your blog, then click go button google moblizer will adjust your blog page to flat wap version.

item.title: What is Google Infrastructure?
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: If you have no idea, you should read this post “Google spotlights data center inner workings”.There are some notes I took as blowing.Google Infrastructure: clusters of 1,800 servers are pretty routine. an ordinary Google search query that involves 700 to 1,000 servers puts 40 servers in each rack Google has 36 data centers across the globe; Google has more than 200,000 servers; growing every day. Google largely builds its own

item.title: Clouds are coming
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 最近两周最吸引我的TAG是这个词“cloud computing”。在我前一个文章中稍微展望了一下云计算的前景“云计算吧电能转化成计算能力，然

item.title: DO you have a google App Engine?
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: There is what I got from http://appengine.google.com/I read a post last night, Developers, start your engines Even I am not a developer, I definitely look forward to sing up appengine. . But I can not have it, that’s pity. Let’s see how to create a ‘hello world’ appp on google appengine.Let me see your app on google. See more on http://appgallery.appspot.com/Google App Engine是一
